title: Sample, ca. 1945
medium:
Medium: wool, rayon and synthetic yarns, plastic strip
Technique: plain weave
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Woven sample mounted to a cardboard card with notations by the designer. Horizontal stripes of green, red, pink and clear plastic. Warp is clear plastic strips alternating with plied beige yarn. Weft is of red bouclé, paired beige twisted and untwisted yarn, pink chenille, red untwisted yarn, and two different green plied yarns.

tombstone.epitaph:
